'''Sigismond Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Sigismond was the son of [[Hildibrand Took]]. He had two children, [[Rosamunda Took|Rosamunda]] and [[Ferdinand Took|Ferdinand]].<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>
==Etymology==
[[Wikipedia:Sigismund|Sigismond]] contains ''sigis'' "victory" and ''mund'' "hand, protection".<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>
